attributes.action: make senior school uniform simple and cheaper for families
attributes.additional_details: because a child doesn't need expensive uniform to learn, its to expensive for some families and uniform doesn't make a child learn better, especially in these uncertain times where many people have lost jobs due to covid 19 and schools are moaning about a child wearing a blazer when parents could just buy a jumper like junior school with a polo shirt and still learn the exact same, our children are suffering without the added pressure of a expensive blazer.
attributes.background: Make schools change uniform from expensive blazer, to standard school coloures jumper and polo tops, make shoes standard black shoes that all families can buy easily.

rejection.details:
We think there petitions are similar:

Prevent schools from requiring uniform bought from specific shops:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332196

Fund school uniform:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329487
